content.raw:
I just tested your fix in 7d0f63b11d0b on homebrew, and it's giving a weird linking error related to ImageIO.framework:

~~~
Running command [IGN_GAZEBO_SYSTEM_PLUGIN_PATH=/Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-gazebo/build/lib DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=/Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-gazebo/build/lib:/usr/local/lib:${DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH} ign-gazebo-server -r -v 4 --iterations 5 -f /Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-gazebo/test/worlds/plugins.sdf]
sh: line 1: 27994 Abort trap: 6           IGN_GAZEBO_SYSTEM_PLUGIN_PATH=/Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-gazebo/build/lib DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=/Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-gazebo/build/lib:/usr/local/lib:${DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH} ign-gazebo-server -r -v 4 --iterations 5 -f /Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-gazebo/test/worlds/plugins.sdf 2>&1
/Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-gazebo/src/ign_TEST.cc:114: Failure
Expected: (output.find("iteration " + std::to_string(i))) != (std::string::npos), actual: 18446744073709551615 vs 18446744073709551615
dyld: Symbol not found: __cg_jpeg_resync_to_restart
  Referenced from: /System/Library/Frameworks/ImageIO.framework/Versions/A/ImageIO
  Expected in: /usr/local/lib/libJPEG.dylib
 in /System/Library/Frameworks/ImageIO.framework/Versions/A/ImageIO
~~~
content.html:
I just tested your fix in 7d0f63b11d0b on homebrew, and it's giving a weird linking error related to ImageIO.framework:

Running command [IGN_GAZEBO_SYSTEM_PLUGIN_PATH=/Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-gazebo/build/lib DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=/Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-gazebo/build/lib:/usr/local/lib:${DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH} ign-gazebo-server -r -v 4 --iterations 5 -f /Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-gazebo/test/worlds/plugins.sdf]
sh: line 1: 27994 Abort trap: 6           IGN_GAZEBO_SYSTEM_PLUGIN_PATH=/Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-gazebo/build/lib DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=/Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-gazebo/build/lib:/usr/local/lib:${DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH} ign-gazebo-server -r -v 4 --iterations 5 -f /Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-gazebo/test/worlds/plugins.sdf 2>&1
/Users/jenkins/Desktop/ign-gazebo/src/ign_TEST.cc:114: Failure
Expected: (output.find("iteration " + std::to_string(i))) != (std::string::npos), actual: 18446744073709551615 vs 18446744073709551615
dyld: Symbol not found: __cg_jpeg_resync_to_restart
  Referenced from: /System/Library/Frameworks/ImageIO.framework/Versions/A/ImageIO
  Expected in: /usr/local/lib/libJPEG.dylib
 in /System/Library/Frameworks/ImageIO.framework/Versions/A/ImageIO
